headline: Better Artificial Intelligence Stock: Verizon vs. BigBear.ai
summary: The artificial intelligence market had a banner year in 2024, growing to $184 billion from $136 billion in 2023.  Two businesses positioned to capitalize on the growth of artificial intelligence (AI) are the telecom Verizon Communications (NYSE: VZ) and newcomer BigBear.ai (NYSE: BBAI).  In some respects, the two businesses are opposites of each other.
